doc:
Chester Morris https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chester_Morris 0 John Chester Brooks Morris (February 16, 1901 – September 11, 1970) was an American stage, film, television, and radio actor. He had some prestigious film roles early in his career, and was nominated for an Academy Award. Chester Morris is best remembered today for portraying Boston Blackie, a criminal-turned-detective, in the modestly budgeted Boston Blackie film series of the 1940s. John_Chester_Brooks_Morris ( February_16_,_1901 – September_11_,_1970 ) was an_American_stage , film , television , and radio_actor . He had some_prestigious_film_roles early in his_career , and was_nominated for an_Academy_Award . Chester_Morris is best_remembered_today for portraying Boston_Blackie , a_criminal-turned-detective_, in the_modestly_budgeted_Boston_Blackie_film_series of the_1940s .
